keyword: how many calories are in saltines
title: How Many Calories Are in Saltines?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in saltines with a standard serving breakdown, full nutrition facts, macros, and simple tweaks for your snack.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Saltines?
assumptions: Plain saltine crackers from standard brands like Nabisco or Keebler; serving of 5 crackers (~15 g total); no toppings or additions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, and preparation. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A serving of 5 saltines provides about 70 kcal, mainly from refined carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Top each with 0.5 tsp cream cheese

faqs.q: How many calories are in saltines?
faqs.a: About 70 calories in a standard serving of 5 saltines.

faqs.q: How many calories in one saltine?
faqs.a: Roughly 14 calories per single saltine cracker.
Yes, 5 saltines have only 1.5 g total fat.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in saltines?
faqs.a: Around 200 mg sodium in 5 saltines; opt for low-sodium if watching intake.

faqs.q: Do saltines have fiber or protein?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.5 g fiber and 1 g protein per 5 saltines.
